dashboard.title: Workforce MSK Health Dashboard
dashboard.subtitle: Monitor and manage your team's musculoskeletal health

trends.title: Monthly Trends
trends.painReductionDesc: The Pain Reduction line displays the average pain improvement percentage for each month based on when follow-up responses and program endings were reported. The higher the percentage, the better the pain reduction results.
trends.programCompletionDesc: The Program Completion line describes month-to-month change in newly Ended Programs compared to previous month.
trends.exerciseComplianceDesc: The Exercise Compliance line describes what % of employees has completed their weekly goals, in a given month. The data updates every week on Monday.

riskAnalysis.title: Risk Analysis by Department
riskAnalysis.employeesTooltip: The data displays Active users and updates in real time.
riskAnalysis.avgPainLevelTooltip: The maximum pain level is 10 (worst), the minimum pain level is 0 (best). The data updates every day at midnight.

exerciseEngagement.title: Exercise Engagement
exerciseEngagement.completedExercisesDescription: The Completed Exercises displays how many exercises employees clicked as "exercised" in a given period. This provides clues about employee exercise adherence and suggest if they need some push (e.g. campaign, motivation, help).
exerciseEngagement.completedProgramsDescription: This progress bar displays the ended programs vs. active programs for a given period. The data updates immediately.
exerciseEngagement.weeklyGoalsDescription: This progress bar displays completed weekly goals vs. active goals for this period. The data updates in a real time.
